entity.name: Mike Pompeo
entity.description: US Secretary of State, Mike Pompeo

text: The U.S. is providing a robust assistance package to our close friend and Ally #Italy. Our Italian friends have been working around the clock to contain #COVID19, and this assistance will help bolster their efforts. We will defeat this by #StandingTogether.
